name: Hands and Pose detection
descr: Set the 21 sights on detected hands of an image or a video. This annotation is based on MediaPipe: https://google.github.io/mediapipe/solutions/hands. Requires an image/a video. Produces a video and a CSV/XRA file with the sights of the detected hands.

options.text: Input pattern of the image, or video file.
Output file pattern with the sights.
Enable pose detection -- for only one human body.
Save points in a CSV file instead of XRA
Draw points on the image, or the video
Save result in a folder with image files -- if video input only
